DOC.brief_summary: Exposure combustion-derived fine particulate air pollution associate cardiovascular mortality morbidity . In previous study , exposure diesel exhaust ( major constituent urban particulate air pollution ) show impair two important function vascular endothelium : vascular vasomotor function endogenous fibrinolysis . Our subsequent study suggest impairment vascular function mediate reduction nitric oxide bioavailability . In study aim investigate cardiovascular response systemic nitric oxide synthase inhibition follow exposure dilute diesel exhaust .
DOC.brief_title: Diesel Exhaust Inhalation , Systemic Nitric Oxide Inhibition Cardiac Output
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer Non smokers No regular medication ( except oral contraceptive ) No recent respiratory tract infection ( within 6 week ) History asthma respiratory disease Smoking history Pregnancy ( positive urinary pregnancy test )
